Instruction: Start Marathon between APR Villa CH gate and APR Villa Phase 3 Gate
Make a left at the Adarsh Clubhouse Road ( stay left side of the road)
Make a left onto APR Villas main road  ( stay left side of the road)
Make a left after passing the lake on your right  ( stay left side of the road)
Make a right onto the main road ( stay left side of the road)
Make a right at the Bay and move straight along the road  ( stay left side of the road)
Take a U turn and travel back on same road - near Villa Entrance near Intel ( stay right side of the road)
Make a left onto the road leading to villas( stay right side of the road)
Make a left onto the road leading to villas( stay right side of the road)
Make a right when passing the lake on your left to reach  APR villas main road (stay right side of the road)
Make a right onto Adarsh Clubhouse Road (stay right side of the road)
Make a right at the APR Villa CH gate
End first loop at start line (between APR Villa CH gate and APR Villa Phase 3 Gate)
You will be starting the second loop
Make a U-turn at the start line
Make a left at the Adarsh Clubhouse Road ( stay left side of the road)
Make a left onto APR Villas main road  ( stay left side of the road)
Make a left after passing the lake on your right  ( stay left side of the road)
Make a right onto the main road ( stay left side of the road)
Make a right at the Bay and move straight along the road  ( stay left side of the road)
Take a U turn and travel back on same road - near Villa Entrance near Intel ( stay right side of the road)
Make a left onto the road leading to villas( stay right side of the road)
Make a left onto the road leading to villas( stay right side of the road)
Make a right when passing the lake on your left to reach  APR villas main road (stay right side of the road)
Make a right onto Adarsh Clubhouse Road (stay right side of the road)
Make a right at the APR Villa CH gate onto the finishing straight
You are done!
